name: Data Fetching Patterns in SPA
description: When a single-page application needs to fetch data from a remote source, it needs to do so while remaining responsive and providing feedback to the user during an often slow query. Five patterns help with this.
author: Juntao QIU - Software Engineer at Atlassian

name: Cleaner components with useSuspenseQuery
description: When a single-page application needs to fetch data from a remote source, it needs to do so while remaining responsive and providing feedback to the user during an often slow query. Five patterns help with this.
author: Swizec Teller

name: Structured logging for Next.js
description: Using the Pino logging library to add structured logging to Next.js. How to set up logging to JSON for Next.js.
author: David Mytton - Arcjet

name: How To Add Page Transitions To NextJS 14
description: flexible page transitions with the NextJS 14 app router. We'll do this without any fancy animation framework tricks.
author: Tom Is Loading - Youtube

name: Authentication (Best Practices)
description: Best practices for authentication in Modern Next.js and React: **Server Components**, **Server Actions**, **Middleware**.
author: Delba de Oliveira - Vercel

name: Deploy without breaking existing apps
description: How to deploy a new version of your app without breaking existing
author: Vercel
